page.title: 05Employment in Weaverthorpe
page.content: About 20 work on{farms,}5 drive for the neighbouring village firm of {hauliers.}The{local factory, coach {firm, garage, shops, joiner,}and the {pubs,}employ a small number. There are 5{teachers,}(3 travelling to outside schools). Most of the younger people work in{Driffield, Scarborough or {Malton. Hair dressing, office work, {shops and factories}are the usual types of work. 3 women are{nurses. There are about 6 long-term {unemployed}here. Until recently the{mushroom growers at{Butterwick}gave employment to most women wanting work, and to a few men. Unfortunately it had to finish almost all of its workers this year. Some of the young women moved to{Dewhirst's {clothing factory in Driffield.}A few of the school leavers are on{Youth {Training Schemes.
